directions: Combine olive oil, red wine vinegar, and Italian dressing mix in a sealable container; shake vigorously.
Place broccoli in a plastic storage container, cover with marinade, and refrigerate, stirring occasionally, for at least 3 hours.
ingredients: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian salad dressing mix (such as Good Seasons®)
title: Simple Marinated Broccoli
